name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Anthracite coal ; Circulating fluidized bed furnace ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 无烟煤 ; 循环流化床炉 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisSodium alkali method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisSodium alkali method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了一种工业过程，该过程涉及使用无烟煤在循环流化床炉中产生蒸汽/热水或其他用途，适用于所有规模。末端治理技术被应用于控制排气，二氧化硫，粉尘和氮氧化物的污染。该数据集适用于寻求实施污染控制措施的工业设施、研究排放减缓技术的环境研究者以及旨在评估无烟煤利用过程环境性能的组织。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5426页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为无烟煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasisWith terminal treatment technology
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是有末端治理。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library of the flow that most closely matches the pollutant indicator, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the production coefficient of 15S (no desulfurizer). Please modify the corresponding emissions after accounting for yourself according to the note.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 15S(无脱硫剂)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library to match the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the production coefficient of 4.5S (add desulfurizer). Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the note after self-calculation.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 4.5S(添加脱硫剂)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Pollutant indicators of sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is wet dust removal method, its efficiency is 15, end-of-pipe treatment facilities actual operating rate (k value) calculation formula for K = desulfurization facilities annual operating hours / boiler annual operating hours. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, pollutant indicators for sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library face to face the most compatible flow, pollutant indicators note for sulfur dioxide original description of the production coefficient of 15S (no desulfurizer). Please modify the corresponding emissions after accounting according to the note.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是湿法除尘法，其效率为15，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硫设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 15S(无脱硫剂)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

The end-of-pipe treatment technology for the pollutant indicator soot is /, and its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, and the pollutant indicator as soot, which has been matched to the most compatible stream in the LCAflow library, and the pollutant indicator remark is that the production coefficient of the original description of the soot is 4.63 A. Please modify the corresponding emissions after calculating according to the remarks by yourself..The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 4.63A。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 4.63A. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
